nodes.text: Elba water was a refreshing beverage that was served at the Happy's Landing ale house on the planet Druckenwell and the Leafy Green tapcafe on Coruscant. It was enjoyed by Tinian I'att Azur-Jamin, Sprig Cheever, Mara Jade Skywalker, and Anakin Solo. At least one treasure hunter uncovered a flask of elba water during the time of the Galactic Civil War.
Elba water was a refreshing liquid that was aqua-colored in appearance.

In 1 BBY, the Human female heiress Tinian I'att Azur-Jamin spent a few credit tokens on a cold glass of elba water at Happy's Landing, an ale house on the planet Druckenwell. Sprig Cheever, the mate of of Twilit Hearth, also had a glass of elba water at the same establishment.

During the time of the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, at least one treasure hunter uncovered a buried container that held a flask of elba water.
In 26 ABY, Mara Jade Skywalker and Anakin Solo visited the Leafy Green tapcafe on Coruscant, where they were each served an elba water by a young Drall server.

Elba water first appeared in "Tinian on Trial," a short story written by Kathy Tyers that was originally published in Star Wars Adventure Journal 4 by West End Games on November 1, 1994. Elba water later appeared as a drink in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. With the release of Chapter 6: Masters of the Wild on May 22, 2007, the game's treasure hunting system was updated. As part of this system, elba water was included as a consumable buff item which could be found in buried treasure containers. The item, when consumed, gave the player a small boost to their block abilities.
